verses.verse: Now <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, <S%H8085>heard<s%> of all that <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> how that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had sent her <S%H7964>away,<s%>

and her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%> The <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> son was <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> for Moses <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have lived as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> in a <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>".

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> was <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> for he <S%H1>said,<s%> "My father's <S%H430>God<s%> was my <S%H5828>help<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2719>sword.<s%>"

<S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> where he was <S%H2583>encamped,<s%> at the <S%H2022>Mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2859>"I,<s%> your father-in-law <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to you with your <S%H802>wife,<s%> and her <S%H8147>two<s%> sons with <S%H1121>her.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H7592>him.<s%> They asked <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H7453>other<s%> of their <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and to the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H182>sake,<s%> all the <S%H8513>hardships<s%> that had <S%H4672>come<s%> on them on the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and how <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> delivered <S%H5337>them.<s%>

<S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H2302>rejoiced<s%> for all the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in that he had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

<S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who has <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> who has <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>
Now I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> than all <S%H430>gods<s%> because of the <S%H1697>thing<s%> in which they dealt arrogantly against <S%H2102>them.<s%>"

<S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, <S%H3947>took<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> for <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with all of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

It happened on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> around <S%H4872>Moses<s%> from the <S%H1242>morning<s%> to the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

When <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H7200>saw<s%> all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "What is this <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you <S%H6213>do<s%> for the <S%H5971>people?<s%> Why do you <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5971>alone,<s%> and all the people <S%H5324>stand<s%> around you from <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H6153>evening?<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, "Because the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to me to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

When they have a <S%H1697>matter,<s%> they <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H8199>me,<s%> and I judge between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and I make them <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and his <S%H8451>laws.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1697>him,<s%> "The thing that you <S%H6213>do<s%> is not <S%H2896>good.<s%>

You will <S%H5034>surely<s%> wear <S%H5034>away,<s%> both <S%H5971>you,<s%> and this people that is with <S%H1697>you;<s%> for the thing is too <S%H3515>heavy<s%> for <S%H3201>you.<s%> You are not able to perform it yourself <S%H6213>alone.<s%>

<S%H8085>Listen<s%> now to my <S%H6963>voice.<s%> I will give you <S%H3289>counsel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> with <S%H5971>you.<s%> You represent the people before <S%H4136>God,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H1697>causes<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall <S%H2094>teach<s%> them the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H8451>laws,<s%> and shall <S%H3045>show<s%> them the <S%H1870>way<s%> in which they must <S%H3212>walk,<s%> and the <S%H4639>work<s%> that they must <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Moreover you shall <S%H2372>provide<s%> out of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> such as <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H571>truth,<s%> <S%H8130>hating<s%> unjust <S%H1215>gain;<s%> and <S%H7760>place<s%> such over <S%H8269>them,<s%> to be rulers of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H6235>tens.<s%>

Let them <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at all <S%H6256>times.<s%> It shall be that every <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> to <S%H6996>you,<s%> but every small <S%H1697>matter<s%> they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H7043>themselves.<s%> So shall it be easier for <S%H5375>you,<s%> and they shall share the load with you.

If you will <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commands<s%> you <S%H3201>so,<s%> then you will be able to <S%H5975>endure,<s%> and all of these <S%H5971>people<s%> also will <S%H935>go<s%> to their <S%H4725>place<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, and <S%H6213>did<s%> all that he had <S%H559>said.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> out of all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> over the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H6235>tens.<s%>

They <S%H8199>judged<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at all <S%H6256>times.<s%> They <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H1697>causes<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> but every <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> they judged <S%H8199>themselves.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> let his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H7971>depart,<s%> and he <S%H3212>went<s%> his way into his own <S%H776>land.<s%>
